channel.title: INartsAndEnt
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INartsAndEnt, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Son Of One Of Batmanâ€™s Closest Allies Becomes His Newest Villain In The Batman 2 Theory
item.description: The Batman Part II will establish a new villain for the series, expanding on the darkness of Gotham, and they could already be connected to Batman.

item.title: Mufasa's White Lions Could Change The Villains Of The Next Lion King Movie
item.description: Mufasa: The Lion King introduced the villainous white lions, and this unique pride could replace the "Outsiders" of The Lion King 2: Simba's Pride.

item.title: 10 Funniest Hulk Scenes In The MCU, Ranked
item.description: The Incredible Hulk might not seems like the funniest character in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, but he has delivered some truly hysterical moments.

item.title: Conor McGregor 'Proud and Excited' Over New Girl Group, Grammys in Sight
item.description: Conor McGregor says he's stoked to have girl group Sweet Love on his label's roster ... and, he's got Grammy gold on the brain. ICYMI ... Conor -- who...

item.title: Missy Elliott Goes Full Transformer Mode at Coachella in Epic Moment
item.description: Missy Elliott put on a showstopping set at the opening night of Coachella ... which included coming out as a freaking Transformer! The crowd went nuts...
